overview: Plow. Plant. Grow. See how farmers prep the fields, plant the seeds, and harvest the crops. Watch tractors, combines, harvesters, windrows, gang disks, and hay rakes working hard. Plus heavy equipment tractors and scrapers digging dirt. Visit the John Deere factory in Waterloo, Iowa and see how their biggest tractors are made. Tap your feet to new songs by award-winning singer/songwriter James Coffey. Plus lots more. Kids learn, laugh, and want more - you will too.  Tough John Deere machines in action getting the job done right.
title: John Deere Action, Part 2
